scripts.deploy:cloudrun: docker build -f Dockerfile.backend -t gcr.io/simply-trade-4fbbd/qualimed-backend . && docker push gcr.io/simply-trade-4fbbd/qualimed-backend && gcloud run deploy qualimed-backend --image gcr.io/simply-trade-4fbbd/qualimed-backend --platform managed --region us-central1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:cloudrun && npm run deploy:hosting
